Functions
00500_TEE_GetPropertyAsUUID
GP_010_Properties

Functions

 TestCase_GC001_gpd_ta_appID ()
 
 TestCase_GC002_gpd_tee_deviceID ()

 TestCase_BC005_nameNull ()
 
 TestCase_BC005_bufferNull ()
 
 TestCase_GC007_boundaryStress ()
 

Detailed Description

Description:
: This test intends to verify the behavior of TA properties APIs for Getting a Property as a UUID. 
           TEE_Result TEE_GetPropertyAsUUID(
                               TEE_PropSetHandle propsetOrEnumerator,
               [instringopt]   char* name,
               [out]           TEE_UUID* value );

           For this test, we will need at least one TA.

           Enumeration is not performed in this test.

           Pre:
           Open a session to a GPTA.

           Post:
           Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC001_gpd_ta_appID ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that a UUID property can be correctly retrieved.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_appID" should return a valid UUID and TEE_SUCCESS Verify that the TEE does not write beyond the length of the UUID buffer
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00500_TEE_GetPropertyAsUUID.GC001_gpd_ta_appID

TestCase_BC003_NonUUIDs ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that attempted retrieval of incorrect properties as a UUID fails.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_singleInstance" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_stackSize" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_version" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd_tee.trustedos.implementation_binaryversion" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd_client_identity" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00500_TEE_GetPropertyAsUUID.BC003_NonUUIDs
TestCase_BC004_nameUnknown ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that attempted retrieval of non-existent properties.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd_ta.stackSize" should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_. For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd_ta.stackSize" should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_. For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_client.identity" should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_.

TestCase_GC007_boundaryStress ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that a UUID property can be correctly retrieved and that it does not overlap on either side of the destination variable.
Test Steps:
Allocate a buffer 4x the size of a TEE_UUID. for 1 to 16: fill the buffer with random data, and make a copy of it for comparison later randomly choose an offset of from 0 to sizeof(TEE_UUID)*2 set TEE_UUID * to the buffer + offset For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd.ta.appID" should return a valid UUID and TEE_SUCCESS Check that all data before the TEE_UUID did not change Check that all data after the TEE_UUID did not change
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00500_TEE_GetPropertyAsUUID.GC007_boundaryStress
